alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana and northwestern Pearl River Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Varnado, or 11 miles northeast of Bogalusa, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poplarville and Varnado. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
